message: I think this is a fair starting point.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement!
Alice, my turn. I'm feeling generous, let's split it 70/30 and call it a day.  Time is money, and we're losing it!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up more than 10% of the initial offer. Let's find a middle ground.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this. We both lose if this drags on.
I'm trying to be realistic, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.  Let's make this deal and move on.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a 60/40 split, which is more than generous considering how much time we've wasted. Take it or leave it, but I won't be going any lower.
